title: "The Quiet Year" - with Gloss and Gadgets
itunes:title: "The Quiet Year" - with Gloss and Gadgets
description:
This week the wonderful Gloss and Gadgets returns to introduce Jasper and Jeremy to Gloss' favourite TTRPG. Listen along as Jasper, Jeremy and Gloss "define the struggles of a community living after the collapse of civilization, and attempt to build something good within their quiet year"*, designed and written by Avery Alder

* The Quiet Year - Buried Without Ceremony

Find Gloss here!

Want more 3BH in your life? You can now buy merchandise here! 

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes including Campfire Chats where we dive into each episode of Outlaws & Obelisks.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
